019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager;
020
021import freemarker.template.Configuration;
022import freemarker.template.TemplateException;
023import io.kubernetes.client.custom.V1Patch;
024import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
025import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesApi;
026import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.Dynamics;
027import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.PatchOptions;
028import java.io.IOException;
029import java.io.StringWriter;
030import java.util.Map;
031import java.util.logging.Logger;
032import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.VmDefChanged.Type;
033
034/**
035 * Delegee for reconciling the stateful set (effectively the pod).
036 */
037@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
038/* default */ class StsReconciler {
039
040    protected final Logger logger = Logger.getLogger(getClass().getName());
041    private final Configuration fmConfig;
042
043    /**
044     * Instantiates a new config map reconciler.
045     *
046     * @param fmConfig the fm config
047     */
048    public StsReconciler(Configuration fmConfig) {
049        this.fmConfig = fmConfig;
050    }
051
052    /**
053     * Reconcile stateful set.
054     *
055     * @param event the event
056     * @param model the model
057     * @param channel the channel
058     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
059     * @throws TemplateException the template exception
060     * @throws ApiException the api exception
061     */
062    public void reconcile(VmDefChanged event, Map<String, Object> model,
063            VmChannel channel)
064            throws IOException, TemplateException, ApiException {
065        DynamicKubernetesApi stsApi = new DynamicKubernetesApi("apps", "v1",
066            "statefulsets", channel.client());
067        var metadata = event.object().getMetadata();
068
069        // Maybe delete
070        if (event.type() == Type.DELETED) {
071            // First set replicas to 0 ...
072            PatchOptions opts = new PatchOptions();
073            opts.setFieldManager("kubernetes-java-kubectl-apply");
074            stsApi.patch(metadata.getNamespace(), metadata.getName(),
075                V1Patch.PATCH_FORMAT_JSON_PATCH,
076                new V1Patch("[{\"op\": \"replace\", \"path\": "
077                    + "\"/spec/replicas\", \"value\": 0}]"),
078                opts).throwsApiException();
079            // ... then delete
080            stsApi.delete(metadata.getNamespace(), metadata.getName())
081                .throwsApiException();
082            return;
083        }
084
085        // Combine template and data and parse result
086        var fmTemplate = fmConfig.getTemplate("runnerSts.ftl.yaml");
087        StringWriter out = new StringWriter();
088        fmTemplate.process(model, out);
089        // Avoid Yaml.load due to
090        // https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/issues/2741
091        var stsDef = Dynamics.newFromYaml(out.toString());
092
093        // If exists apply changes only when transitioning state
094        // or not running.
095        var existing = K8s.get(stsApi, metadata);
096        if (existing.isPresent()) {
097            var current = GsonPtr.to(existing.get().getRaw())
098                .to("spec").getAsInt("replicas").orElse(1);
099            var desired = GsonPtr.to(stsDef.getRaw())
100                .to("spec").getAsInt("replicas").orElse(1);
101            if (current == 1 && desired == 1) {
102                return;
103            }
104        }
105
106        // Do apply changes
107        PatchOptions opts = new PatchOptions();
108        opts.setForce(true);
109        opts.setFieldManager("kubernetes-java-kubectl-apply");
110        stsApi.patch(stsDef.getMetadata().getNamespace(),
111            stsDef.getMetadata().getName(), V1Patch.PATCH_FORMAT_APPLY_YAML,
112            new V1Patch(channel.client().getJSON().serialize(stsDef)),
113            opts).throwsApiException();
114    }
115
116}
